title: Batista Family Revamps Holding Company in Bid to Tap Debt Markets
description: Brazil’s billionaire Batista family is revamping its holding company to incorporate its pulp, mining and consumer goods businesses, in a bid to better access debt markets and more nimbly manage its priorities.
